species.name: pawmi
descriptions: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.
The pads of its paws are electricity-discharging organs. Pawmi fires electricity from its forepaws while standing unsteadily on its hind legs.

abilities.name: static
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: natural-cure
abilities.effect: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

abilities.name: iron-fist
abilities.effect: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.
